text:
NYC Department of Veterans' Services Commissioner James Hendon is urging every New Yorker to get the #COVID19 vaccine. 

"It is safe. It is effective. And it is part of the pathway to recovery." 

Make a #vaccine appointment at https://t.co/j1XF8UqNnr. #NYCVaccineForAll https://t.co/RsPd0QqmUF
